alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 5:20PM EDT until June 04 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Pasco County in west central Florida... Northwestern Hillsborough County in west central Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 519 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Land O Lakes, or near Lutz, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Westchase, Wesley Chapel, Land O Lakes, Thonotosassa, Pebble Creek, Carrollwood, Citrus Park, and Greater Carrollwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
